channel.title: Posts on Aitor Viana
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Aitor Viana

item.title: Not so java anymore
item.description: Java does not feel so “Java” anymore. And to show it we’re going to take a look at Java 14.

item.title: Most common interviewer mistakes
item.description: If you do interviews, maybe these lines resonate with you and help you get better.

item.title: Most common mistakes during interviews
item.description: Some common mistakes candidates make during the interview that are highly avoidable, so I thought I’d spend just a little bit of time writing those down and share them.

item.title: Android Face-Tracking Playground
item.description: In this post I will walk you through the processing of building a face-tracking detector in Android.

item.title: Android Shared Element Transitions for all
item.description: Android share element transitions in a nutshel.

item.title: Annotation Processing in Android Studio
item.description: I did code generation and metaprogramming in the past and recently I started doing it for Android, so I decided to write this code-generation 101.

item.title: Android Fingerprint Authentication library
item.description: Nothing fancy, just fingerprint authentication for Android.
